component.name: LayerArcIMS
component.file: LayerArcIMS.swf (compiled layer, needed for publication on internet)
LayerArcIMS.xml (configurationfile for layer, needed for publication on internet)

configtag.name: <fmc:LayerArcIMS>
<fmc:LayerArcIMS>

attribute.name: timeout
timeout
attribute.description: (defaultvalue "10") Time in seconds when the ArcIMSLayer will dispatch an onErrorUpdate event.

attribute.name: retryonerror
retryonerror
attribute.description: (defaultvalue "0") Number of retrys when encountering an error.

attribute.name: minscale
minscale
attribute.description: if mapscale exceeds minscale, the layer will not be shown

attribute.name: maxscale
maxscale
attribute.description: if mapscale exceeds maxscale, the layer will not be shown

attribute.name: identifydistance
identifydistance
attribute.description: Distance in pixels for performing getFeatures request.

attribute.name: featurelimit
featurelimit
attribute.description: Number of features that will return after an identify.

attribute.name: fullextent
fullextent
attribute.description: Extent of layer (comma seperated list of minx,miny,maxx,maxy). You can define your own fullextent.

attribute.name: identifyall
identifyall
attribute.description: (defaultvalue "false") true or false; true= all layerid's will be identified, false = identify stops after identify success

attribute.name: legend
legend
attribute.description: (defaultvalue "false") true or false; false = no legend image wil be generated with an update

attribute.name: server
server
attribute.description: servername of the ArcIMS mapservice

attribute.name: servlet
servlet
attribute.description: (defaultvalue "servlet/com.esri.esrimap.Esrimap")

attribute.name: mapservice
mapservice
attribute.description: mapservicename

attribute.name: hidelegendids
hidelegendids
attribute.description: Comma seperated list of layerid's (same as in axl) Id's in this list will not appear in a legend.

attribute.name: visibleids
visibleids
attribute.description: Comma seperated list of layerid's (same as in axl) Id's in this list will be visible.

attribute.name: hiddenids
hiddenids
attribute.description: Comma seperated list of layerid's (same as in axl) Id's in this list will be hidden.

attribute.name: identifyids
identifyids
attribute.description: Comma seperated list of layerid's (same as in axl) Id's in this list will be identified in the order of the list.

attribute.name: visible
visible
attribute.description: (defaultvalue "true") true or false

configtag.description: This tag defines a ESRI arcims layer.

configtag.name: <layer>
<layer>

attribute.name: id
id
attribute.description: Maplayerid, same as in the axl.

attribute.name: subfields
subfields
attribute.description: Comma seperated list of fields, which will be identified.

attribute.name: query
query
attribute.description: The 'where' clause in the getImage and getFeatures request.

configtag.description: This defines a sublayer of an ArcIMS mapservice

property.name: featurelimit
featurelimit
property.description: Number of features that can return after an identify.

property.name: identifyall
identifyall
property.description: If true all layers will be identified, if false the identify stops after a succesfull identify.

property.name: identifyids
identifyids
property.description: Comma seperated list of layerids that wil be identified in this order. If a layer is actually identified, depends on the visible and identify properties in the layers object!

property.name: layers
layers
property.description: Object containing layer-objects per id. A layer object has the properties: visible, legend,query,subfields,identify

property.name: legend
legend
property.description: If true ArcIMS will also render a legendfile

property.name: retryonerror
retryonerror
property.description: number of retry's when an error occur

property.name: servlet
servlet
property.description: Servletname, when empty the connector uses the default: "servlet/com.esri.esrimap.Esrimap"

property.name: timeout
timeout
property.description: Time in seconds when the layer dispatches an error event.

property.name: updating
updating
property.description: [read only] Is true when a layer is performing an update sequence.

property.name: visible
visible
property.description: [read only] Determines if a layer is visible. To change the visibility of a layer use the methods hide and show

method.name: setLayersIdentify
setLayersIdentify

parameter.name: val
val
parameter.description: Comma seperated strings of affected layers.

method.description: Determines if a layer can be identified.

method.name: setLayersLegend
setLayersLegend

parameter.name: val
val
parameter.description: Comma seperated strings of affected layers.

method.description: Set the appearance of a layer in a legend.

method.name: setLayersVisible
setLayersVisible

parameter.name: val
val
parameter.description: Comma seperated strings of affected layers.

method.description: Set the appearance of a layer in the map.

event.name: onGetLegend
onGetLegend
event.description: Dispatched when a legend is returned during an update sequence.

event.name: onHide
onHide
event.description: Dispatched when the layer is hidden.

event.name: onIdentify
onIdentify
event.description: Dispatched when the layer is identified.

event.name: onIdentifyComplete
onIdentifyComplete
event.description: Dispatched when the identify is completed.

event.name: onIdentifyData
onIdentifyData

parameter.name: identifyextent
identifyextent
parameter.description: the original extent that is identified

event.description: Dispatched when the layer is identified and data is returned

event.name: onIdentifyError
onIdentifyError
event.description: Dispatched when the layer is identified and an error occurs.

event.name: onIdentifyRequest
onIdentifyRequest

parameter.name: requestobject
requestobject
parameter.description: the object returned from the ArcIMSConnector, containing the raw requests.

event.description: Dispatched when the layer is identified.

event.name: onIdentifyResponse
onIdentifyResponse

parameter.name: responseobject
responseobject
parameter.description: the object returned from the ArcIMSConnector, containing the raw response.

event.description: Dispatched when the layer is identified.

event.name: onInit
onInit
event.description: Dispatched when a the layer is up and running and ready to update for the first time.

event.name: onShow
onShow
event.description: Dispatched when the layer is shown.

event.name: onUpdate
onUpdate

parameter.name: nrtry
nrtry
parameter.description: number of retry after an error.

event.description: Dispatched when the starts an update sequence.

event.name: onUpdateComplete
onUpdateComplete

parameter.name: updatetime
updatetime
parameter.description: total time of the update sequence

event.description: Dispatched when the layer is completely updated.

event.name: onUpdateError
onUpdateError
event.description: Dispatched when the layer is updated and an error occurs.

event.name: onUpdateProgress
onUpdateProgress

parameter.name: bytestotal
bytestotal
parameter.description: Total of bytes to be downloaded.

event.description: Dispatched when the layerimage is downloaded.

event.name: onUpdateRequest
onUpdateRequest

parameter.name: requestobject
requestobject
parameter.description: the object returned from the ArcIMSConnector, containing the raw requests.

event.description: Dispatched when the layer is updated.

event.name: onUpdateResponse
onUpdateResponse

parameter.name: requestobject
requestobject
parameter.description: the object returned from the ArcIMSConnector, containing the raw response.

event.description: Dispatched when the layer is updated.
